meanings.sent1: The baldheaded man always wore a hat to protect his head from the sun.
meanings.sent2: My grandpa is baldheaded, but he looks very distinguished.
meanings.sent3: The baldheaded baby looked adorable with a tiny cap on.
meanings.sent4: The baldheaded mountain peak stood out against the blue sky.
meanings.sent5: The baldheaded eagle soared gracefully through the sky.

meanings.definition: A person with a bald head.
meanings.sent1: The baldheaded sat in the park, enjoying the sunshine.
meanings.sent2: I saw a baldheaded walking down the street with confidence.
meanings.sent3: The baldheaded was the first to feel the raindrops falling.
meanings.sent4: The baldheaded in the mirror looked back at me with a smile.
meanings.sent5: The baldheaded at the party stood out among the crowd.
